ing.item: Round steak, cut in serving sizes
Jars beef gravy, or make your own

directions.step: Roll steak in a little flour. Brown in skillet with a little shortening. Put browned steak in a roaster. Cover with gravy. Add onion and green pepper sprinkled on top. Cover roaster with lid. Bake at 325 degrees for 2 hours. Check steak occasionally to make sure steak doesn't bake dry.
